title: Screenshots can't be removed
author: OscF95
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
Screenshot took using term tab can't be deleted clicking in the **x** icon.
## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
When the **x** button that is in the top right of the screenshot is clicked, the image screenshot should be deleted.

iterations.description: The application generates screenshots but lacks a user interface for managing and deleting these files, which contradicts documentation suggesting a 'Screenshot Manager' with deletion capabilities.

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The application generates screenshots but lacks a user interface for managing and deleting these files, which contradicts documentation suggesting a 'Screenshot Manager' with deletion capabilities.
Approach: Implement a dedicated 'Screenshot Manager' UI as a new form/dockable window that lists all saved screenshots from the designated directory. This manager will provide functionality to view and delete selected screenshots. An entry point to this manager will be added to the main application UI, possibly via the existing connection tab context menu or a new menu item.
